Desc.entry: Offers counselling, art therapy and supervision by experienced, fully accredited and registered therapists practising according to the ethical frameworks of their respective professional bodies. Works with individuals and groups, covering a wide range of issues and difficulties. An initial appointment gives the opportunity to meet and discuss the client's counselling/therapy needs and to decide what may be the best way forward. Counsellors are accredited/registered by the BACP, UKCP and HPC. Self or any referral.
